create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATALIST_WEBSITESPONSORSHIPCHECKOUTSOURCE (@CONTEXTID nvarchar(100)) as begin -- CONTEXTID is not currently used.
set nocount on;
declare @sources table ( SORTORDER tinyint, APPEALID uniqueidentifier, SOLICITORID uniqueidentifier, SOURCEDESC nvarchar(50), HASADDITIONALINFORMATION bit, ADDITIONALINFORMATIONCAPTION nvarchar(100), ADDITIONALINFORMATIONDATALISTID uniqueidentifier )
insert @sources values (1, null, null, 'Appeal Code', 1, 'Enter the Appeal Code', null), (2, '6263FDBE-35ED-4211-A635-92B0D8F64F7D', '289FAF87-C584-4A2C-8114-03FE09DD37CD', 'Children''s Cup', 0, '', null), (3, null, null, 'Concert/Artist', 1, 'Enter the Concert/Artist', null), (4, null, null, 'Facebook', 0, '', null), (5, null, null, 'Friend', 0, '', null), (6, null, null, 'Internet', 0, '', null), (7, null, null, 'Ministry Representative', 1, 'Enter the Representative', 'ab6d3036-b61f-45a5-bbaf-5e01f9ef9349'), (8, null, null, 'Radio', 1, 'Enter the Radio Call Letters', null), (9, null, null, 'Other ', 1, 'Enter How You Heard About MoM', null)
select SORTORDER, APPEALID, SOLICITORID, SOURCEDESC, HASADDITIONALINFORMATION, ADDITIONALINFORMATIONCAPTION, ADDITIONALINFORMATIONDATALISTID from @sources order by SORTORDER end
